name: World Bowling Championship
description:
World Bowling Champion ship is a casual game for everyone.

[Game feature]
- Simply touch and slide to strike pins.
- over 400 stages
- You can play the game anywhere even without network connection!
- Bonus stage: Strike 100 pins and get rewards!
- 5 items that can make differences on the game result.
- Multi-play mode: 1 on 1 Versus Mode
- 16 languages supported.
- Leader Board, Achievement and friend invitation features are supported
